#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

typedef struct frac
{
    long long num, den;
}frac;

frac operator +(frac x, int a)
{
    a = a * x.den;
    x.num = x.num + a;
    return x;
}

frac operator /(frac x, frac y)
{
    frac temp;
    temp.num = x.num;
    temp.den = y.num;
    return temp;
}

int main()
{
    long m;
    int t, n;
    frac x;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        cin>>m;
        x.num = 1;
        x.den = 1;

        if(n == 1)
        {

        }
        else
        {
            n--;
            while(n--)
            {
                x = (x+1)/(x+2);
                x.num = x.num % m;
                x.den = x.den % m;
            }

        }

        cout<<(x.num%m)<<"/"<<(x.den%m)<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
